docs.text:
Merlin.jl


Merlin
 is a deep learning framework written in 
Julia
. It aims to provide a fast, flexible and compact deep learning library for machine learning.


See README.md for basic usage.


Basically,




Wrap your data with 
Var
 type.


Apply functions to the 
Var
.




x
 
=
 
Var
(
rand
(
Float32
,
10
,
5
))


f
 
=
 
Linear
(
Float32
,
10
,
3
)


y
 
=
 
f
(
x
)
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Merlin  is a deep learning framework written in  Julia . It aims to provide a fast, flexible and compact deep learning library for machine learning.  See README.md for basic usage.  Basically,   Wrap your data with  Var  type.  Apply functions to the  Var .   x   =   Var ( rand ( Float32 , 10 , 5 ))  f   =   Linear ( Float32 , 10 , 3 )  y   =   f ( x )
docs.title: Merlin.jl
